title: SB 1.19.35-36 | HH Stoka Krishna Swami | 04-06-2023 | Daily Evening Bhagavatam Discourse
speaker: HH Stoka Krishna Swami

segments.key_quote: Lord Krishna, the personality of Godhead, who is very dear to the sons of King Pandu, has accepted me as one of those relatives just to please his great cousins and brothers.
segments.summary: Parikshit Maharaj emphasizes the close family connection between Krishna and the Pandavas, highlighting their devotion.

segments.key_quote: The Lord gives special protection to the family members and descendants of a devotee, even though such members are themselves non-devotees.
segments.summary: Prabhupada explains that pure devotees serve their families better than those attached to illusory family affairs, as Krishna protects the families of devotees.

segments.key_quote: Krishna personally saved this Pariksit when he was in the womb of his mother, because this Pariksit was the only surviving descendant of the entire Pandava family.
segments.summary: The speaker explains that Krishna takes care of the family members of devotees, even if the devotee has to give up family responsibilities to serve the Lord's mission, citing the example of Parikshit being saved by Krishna.

segments.key_quote: Krishna arranged, Pariksit should hear Bhagavatam, so that Pariksit is benefited, by Shukadeva Goswami speaking the Bhagavatam, and not only Pariksit, through Pariksit, many many millions of people, and all future generations of people, are benefited.
segments.summary: The speaker explains that Shukadeva Goswami was inspired by Krishna to appear before Parikshit and impart the teachings of Srimad Bhagavatam, benefiting not only Parikshit but also future generations.

segments.key_quote: To get the assistance and help of a bona fide spiritual master means, to receive the direct help of the Lord himself.
segments.summary: The speaker emphasizes the importance of the spiritual master as the manifested representative of the Lord, stating that receiving help from a bona fide spiritual master is equivalent to receiving direct help from Krishna.
